main_definition: Builders are individuals or groups who construct, assemble, or create something physical such as buildings or objects.

meanings_and_examples.definition: People involved in the construction industry
meanings_and_examples.example: The builders worked tirelessly to erect a new skyscraper downtown.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Programmers or developers who create software programs and applications
meanings_and_examples.example: In the tech company, the group of builders developed a cutting-edge mobile application.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Individuals engaged in creating virtual worlds for video games
meanings_and_examples.example: The game design team acted as builders, crafting immersive landscapes and environments within the open-world game.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Organizations or teams that assemble and distribute physical products
meanings_and_examples.example: Efficient warehouse operations were crucial for the builders to ensure timely delivery of goods.
